circle.style: fill: none; stroke: #ebf2f3; stroke-width: 10; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-miterlimit: 10; position: relative; z-index: -1; color: #ebf2f3;

stroke-dashoffset: 210px;fill: none; stroke: #00acb1; transform-origin: center center; stroke-dasharray: 700; stroke-width: 10px; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-miterlimit: 10; transform: rotate( -90deg ); transition: stroke-dashoffset 1s; color: #00acb1; stroke-linecap: round;
